name: Sink the Bismarck!
description:
Quick game created for the inaugural Flare Path Game Jam on the Rock Paper Shotgun website. See https://www.rockpapershotgun.com/2020/09/25/the-inaugural-flare-path-game-jam/

This was one of the first games I've ever created so expect lots of bugs. In fact if the game works at all you are doing well ;)
